overview: On Christmas Eve, the parents of Clara and Fritz have invited guests. Among them is Claraâ€™s godfather Drosselmeyer, who presents her with a nutcracker. Clara is delighted and finally falls asleep with her Christmas present tucked under her arm. But at midnight Drosselmeyer appears as a wizard and transforms the Nutcracker into a prince.
title: Salzburg Marionette Theatre: The Nutcracker
